title: Forza Football - Live soccer scores
description:
Forza is the best football app used by over 5 million football fans across the globe. Get live scores, football updates and video highlights for over 420 football leagues.
Are you a diehard football fan? Forza is the ultimate live football app to follow live matches, football video highlights, favourite teams and football leagues around the world.
Never miss out on team news, lineups, real-time football updates and catch instant video highlights. Follow the Premier League, UEFA Champions League, Women's World Cup, FA Cup, EFL Championship and over 420 football leagues around the world.
Forza is the ideal app for following Women’s football including this summer’s World Cup. We are working hard to make football a more equal place and that means providing the best coverage we can.
For the World Cup, we will have lineups, live scores, stats and highlights, as well as lightning fast notifications, so you don’t miss a thing.
With a click of a button, get live football scores, player stats, football fixtures and live football video highlights for your favorite football leagues around the world.
Key features include:
• Alerts for live football updates - lineups, goals, red cards, full-time results, video highlights and more.
• Over 420 football leagues around the world including the UEFA Champions League, Premier league, UEFA Nations League, La Liga, Serie A, Bundesliga, Ligue 1, etc.
• Instant live football updates, with scores refreshing every 10 seconds
• Pre-match line-ups with formations, player photos, substitutes and injuries.
• Incredibly quick, accurate football updates and football live scores compared to other football apps
Opinion polls:
• Share your opinions about your favourite football team and see how they match up with other fans
• Answer poll questions about the teams, the manager and the chairman
• Get your voice heard around the world
• Be part of a collective movement to change the way football fans are listened to
We’re really proud of our apps and we hope you’ll love them as much as we do. If you have any feedback to share with us, please contact us.
Email: app@forzafootball.com
Website: www.forzafootball.com
Twitter: @ForzaFootball
